headerText: The `v-tooltip` component is useful for conveying information when a user hovers over an element. You can also programmatically control the display of tooltips through a **v-model**

alignment.desc: Tooltip can be aligned to any of the four sides of the activator element

visibility.desc: Tooltip visibility can be programmatically changed using `v-model`.

props.closeDelay: Delay (in ms) after which menu closes (when open-on-hover prop is set to true)
props.debounce: Duration before tooltip is shown and hidden when hovered
props.openDelay: Delay (in ms) after which menu opens (when open-on-hover prop is set to true)
props.tag: Specifies a custom tag for the activator wrapper
